de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.style

Interface ClassStylingPolicy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    StylingPolicy, VisualizationItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClusterStylingPolicy, SegmentsStylingPolicy

    public interface ClassStylingPolicy
extends StylingPolicy
    Styling policy that is based on classes, for example clusters or labels. This allows for certain optimizations such as marker reuse, and thus is preferred when possible.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
